definition: Zhonglou district of Changzhou city 常州市[Chang2 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu
bell tower/campanile/clock tower/Bell Tower, historic attraction in Xian, Beijing etc
clock/o'clock/time as measured in hours and minutes/bell/CL:架[jia4],座[zuo4]
house with more than 1 story/storied building/floor/CL:層|层[ceng2],座[zuo4],棟|栋[dong4]
Zhonglou district of Changzhou city 常州市[Chang2 zhou1 shi4], Jiangsu
The Hunchback of Notre-Dame by Victor Hugo 維克多·雨果|维克多·雨果[Wei2 ke4 duo1 · Yu3 guo3]

sentences.english: On the two sides of the Heaven Palace are Bell Tower and Runner Tibet.
sentences.chinese: 天王殿兩側分別是鐘樓和轉輪藏。

sentences.english: A floor under the bells of an open belfry .
sentences.chinese: 在露天鐘樓的鐘下面的那一層板。

sentences.english: The Bell Tower in Xi'an was not only built earlier, but also taller than any other in the country.
sentences.chinese: 因而西安的鐘樓不但修的早，而且也修得高大雄偉。

sentences.english: The clock tower affair has set the alarm bells ringing.
sentences.chinese: 今次天星鐘樓事件，爲港府吸納民意的機制敲響警鐘。

sentences.english: When they met in the church tower the gaps in their fragmentary conversation were filled up.
sentences.chinese: 到了教堂的鐘樓，他們零碎談話的空隙纔算給填滿。

sentences.english: Zhonglou District is established as the provincial level community education pilot area.
sentences.chinese: 鐘樓區被確定爲省級社區教育實驗區。

sentences.english: Next to the church stands the medieval bell tower of St. Urban.
sentences.chinese: 中世紀的聖歐本鐘樓矗立在大教堂的邊上。

sentences.english: I heard that there is a huge bell in the BellTower, what is that for?
sentences.chinese: 我聽說鐘樓上有一口大鐘，它是做什麼用的？

sentences.english: The high bell tower cast a long shadow on the grass.
sentences.chinese: 高高的鐘樓在草地上投下長長的影子。

sentences.english: The pastor at St. Vincent's Cathedral stands in the belfry , tries to coax the birds into the arched window.
sentences.chinese: 聖文森教堂的牧師站在鐘樓裏，想把鳥兒誘入拱窗。

sentences.english: It was a church with a shuttered belfry and spire.
sentences.chinese: 那是一座有百葉窗的鐘樓和尖頂的教堂。

sentences.english: There also had been hundreds of in my belfry and attic.
sentences.chinese: 在我的鐘樓和閣樓也有好幾百只。

sentences.english: Hon choy so-yuk raised a question on demolition project for the old star ferry pier clock tower.
sentences.chinese: 蔡素玉議員就舊天星碼頭鐘樓拆卸工程提出一項質詢。

sentences.english: The Tower of Pisa is the bell tower of that city's cathedral in Italy.
sentences.chinese: 比薩斜塔位於意大利，是大教堂的鐘樓。

sentences.english: It's few kilometers' distance since we campus to the Bell Tower.
sentences.chinese: 從咱們學院到鐘樓有三公里遠。

sentences.english: These two timers were a reference to the Drum Tower and Bell Tower.
sentences.chinese: 這兩個計時器關係到鐘樓和鼓樓。

definition: gold and jade in glorious splendor (idiom)/fig. a dazzling sight (e.g. royal palace)
a drum tower/Drum Tower, historic attraction in Xian, Beijing etc
